question: Pakistan is said to have decided to elevate which region to a full-fledged province status?
explanation:
As per the media reports, Pakistan has decided to elevate the status of Gilgit-Baltistan to that of a full-fledged province.
India has conveyed to Pakistan that the entire Union territories of Jammu and Kashmir and Ladakh, including the areas of Gilgit and Baltistan, are Integral parts of the country. Prime Minister of Pakistan Imran Khan is to announce constitutional rights for the province soon.
